pkgmetadata.longdescription: User-Friendly R Interface to Biologic Web Services' API // Currently fully supports miEAA, PANTHER, Reactome, STRING, and UniProt! The goal of rbioapi is to provide a user-friendly and consistent interface to biological databases and services; It is designed in a way that insulates the user from technicalities when it comes to using API services and creates a unified and easy-to-implement tool to connect to biological databases and services. With rbioapi, You are not required to have any prior technical knowledge. Just fill in a function's arguments and the rest is handled for you. This an ongoing project. New databases and services will be implemented periodically to gradually make rbioapi more comprehensive. Feel free to suggest any databases or services you often use.
